definitions.text: the activity of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort or purpose
examples: he gave me an assist with the housework
rescue party went to their aid

definitions.text: (sports) the act of enabling another player to make a good play
give help or assistance; be of service
examples: Everyone helped out during the earthquake
Can you help me carry this table?
She never helps around the house

definitions.text: act as an assistant in a subordinate or supportive function
work for or be a servant to
examples: She attends the old lady in the wheelchair
Can you wait on our table, please?
The minister served the King for many years
